## ChapstickStyleProvider class

Implementation using Chapstick's Style class with injected adapters.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ChapstickStyleProvider implements StyleProvider 
```
**Implements:** [StyleProvider](./chapstick.styleprovider.md)
